body_html:
So I was building using CUDA 9 and failing as well. I think it is possible that this is a CUDA 9 issue isolated to windows, since similar issues are happening with tensorflow 1.4.0, where CUDA 9 works with TF 1.4 on Linux and Mac, but fails on windows.

The easiest way forward might be to notify Nvidia and wait for them to release a fix. Hopefully somebody from the Tensorflow team has decided to do this.

The easiest way forward might be to notify Nvidia and wait for them to release a fix. Hopefully somebody from the Tensorflow team has decided to do this.
body:
So I was building using CUDA 9 and failing as well. I think it is possible that this is a CUDA 9 issue isolated to windows, since similar issues are happening with tensorflow 1.4.0, where CUDA 9 works with TF 1.4 on Linux and Mac, but fails on windows.

The easiest way forward might be to notify Nvidia and wait for them to release a fix. Hopefully somebody from the Tensorflow team has decided to do this.
